reviews.review_msg: I took him in both GEOG102 and 111. He usually speaks monotone so the lectures might be boring but he really cares students alot and wants all students to get satisfied grade. He is very kind and generous to all students. Midterms might hard but final is very easy. Be sure to go lecture because he gives hints on midterm and final.

Faran is a very nice teacher who wants his students to succeed. However, his lectures are quite dry and most of the exam questions were quite trivial to what was discussed in class. There are weekly readings to do and discuss for tutorials as well and a good portion of your marks depend on your participation in those discussions.
Super nice guy. His lectures can be a little dry, but the content is easy and interesting. Definitely cares about his subject and his students! The textbook is definitely not needed though.

I took Geog 102 with Faran for my first semester of university and it was awesome! Super caring prof, wants students to do well, and gives good info in the lectures. One lecture he asked us if we wanted an extension on the assignment and we all said yes, so he said okay you all get another week!! What a great prof!! Would recommend!
His class avarage is B so if you are looking for B without working hard, take a class with him, he is a really nice and kind prof
Not very clear when he give lecture but everything he says is writen in the slides so you even don't need to go to class
Would take a class with him again
an easy A or B class,, recommend it
an easy course, the prof is not very clear but his sildes has everything
ignore what other said, he is simply very nice and kind prof, who care about his student. English his 2nd language that why he is no perfect in English. Overall, you could understand him
He is willing to re-mark you paper, exam. they only prof I ever seen so far at SFU, care about his students to get really good grades. I will take a course with him again. Really best prof at SFU

very very nice and kind prof. he do want every one of his student to get a good grade and willing& welcoming  to re-mark each assignment. Most of the time he will give good grades. the best prof at sfu
